articles.title: Affordable OnePlus N200 5G will go on sale on June 25th
articles.description: The OnePlus N200 5G is a very affordable 5G phone with a 6.5-inch screen and 90Hz refresh rate, 13-megapixel main rear-facing camera, and a big 5,000mAh battery.
articles.content:
It features a big battery and 90Hz display for $239
The OnePlus N200 is one of the least expensive 5G phones to go on sale in the US.
Image: OnePlus
